00074 typedef struct STRATEGIC_STATUS
00075 {
00076       UINT32            uiFlags;
00077       UINT8             ubNumCapturedForRescue;
00078 
00079       UINT8             ubHighestProgress;                  // the highest level of progress player has attained thus far in the game (0-100)
00080 
00081       UINT8             ubStandardArmyGunIndex[ARMY_GUN_LEVELS];        // type of gun in each group that Queen's army is using this game
00082       BOOLEAN           fWeaponDroppedAlready[MAXITEMS];                      // flag that tracks whether this weapon type has been dropped before 
00083 
00084       UINT8             ubMercDeaths;                                   // how many soldiers have bit it while in the player's employ (0-100)
00085       UINT32            uiManDaysPlayed;                    // once per day, # living mercs on player's team is added to this running total
00086 
00087       UINT8             ubBadReputation;                    // how bad a reputation player has earned through his actions, performance, etc. (0-100)
00088 
00089       UINT16            usEnricoEmailFlags;           // bit flags that control progress-related E-mails from Enrico
00090 
00091       UINT8             ubInsuranceInvestigationsCnt;       // how many times merc has been investigated for possible insurance fraud
00092 
00093       UINT8             ubUnhiredMercDeaths;          // how many mercs have died while NOT working for the player
00094 
00095       UINT16            usPlayerKills;                            // kills achieved by all mercs controlled by player together.  *Excludes* militia kills!
00096 
00097       UINT16            usEnemiesKilled[NUM_WAYS_ENEMIES_KILLED][NUM_ENEMY_RANKS];  // admin/troop/elite.  Includes kills by militia, too
00098       UINT16            usLastDayOfPlayerActivity;
00099       UINT8             ubNumNewSectorsVisitedToday;
00100       UINT8             ubNumberOfDaysOfInactivity;
00101 
00102       INT8 bPadding[70];
00103 
00104 } STRATEGIC_STATUS;
